attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a democratic country, it is not acceptable to have specific topics and petitions stonewalled. I.e. Trident, or other 'sensitive' and seemingly 'closed'  issues. As a fully paid up citizen, who apparently has open access to the issues of government, I should be allowed to make my voice heard on ALL issues that effect me or offend me. Did I misunderstand the BIG CONVERSATION?

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
